languages.text: {n}Глаза друкари вспыхивают от наслаждения при виде ужаса на лице дознавателя.{/n} "Да, мон-кай. Ты хотел доказательств того, как слаб твой род и ничтожны твои слуги? Имя Эмелины Лихтенхарт. Бедный обгорелый зверек... он так старался, так стремился расположить своего нового хозяина, что продал вас всех..." {n}Маражай умолкает на мгновение, словно прислушиваясь, а затем плотоядно усмехается.{/n} "О, Хейнрикс ван Калокс. Осколки твоих наивных иллюзий столь сладко потрошат твою душу..."

{n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai brillent de plaisir en admirant l'expression d'horreur qui se peint sur le visage d'Heinrix.{/n} « Eh si, mon-keigh. Vous voulez une preuve de la faiblesse de votre espèce ? De l'inutilité de vos serviteurs ? Vous voilà servi. Le nom d'Emelina Lichtenhart. Pauvre créature calcinée... Il a pourtant fait de son mieux, il était si empressé de servir son nouveau maître qu'il vous a tous trahis... » {n}Marazhai penche la tête, comme s'il voulait entendre un son ténu, puis sa bouche s'étire en un rictus carnassier.{/n} « Oh, Heinrix van Calox. Les éclats de vos naïves illusions vous lacèrent l'âme d'une manière délectable... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai brillent de plaisir en admirant l'expression d'horreur qui se peint sur le visage d'Heinrix.{/n} « Eh si, mon-keigh. Vous voulez une preuve de la faiblesse de votre espèce ? De l'inutilité de vos serviteurs ? Vous voilà servi. Le nom d'Emelina Lichtenhart. Pauvre créature calcinée... Il a pourtant fait de son mieux, il était si empressé de servir son nouveau maître qu'il vous a tous trahis... » {n}Marazhai penche la tête, comme s'il voulait entendre un son ténu, puis sa bouche s'étire en un rictus carnassier.{/n} « Oh, Heinrix van Calox. Les éclats de vos naïves illusions déchirent votre âme d'une manière délectable... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看到海因里希脸上恐怖的表情，目光中闪烁着喜悦的光芒。{/n}“没什么不可能的，猴子。你不是想让我证明，你的族人有多么软弱，你的仆人有多么不值一提，不是吗？那只烧坏了脸的可怜畜生，他提到了艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特的名字……他真的很努力，真的很想取悦他的新主人，把你们每个人都出卖了……”{n}玛拉斋歪着头，似乎在努力听着远处的声音，随后露出了贪婪的笑容。{/n}“噢，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，你天真幻想的碎片撕开了你的灵魂。这种感觉是如此甜蜜……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看到海因里希脸上恐怖的表情，目光中闪烁着喜悦的光芒。{/n}“没什么不可能的，猴子。你不是想让我证明，你的族人有多么软弱，你的仆人有多么不值一提，不是吗？那个烧坏了脸的猴子，他提到了艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特的名字……他真的很努力，真的很想取悦他的新主人，于是把你们全都出卖了……”{n}玛拉斋歪着头，似乎在努力听着远处的声音，随后露出了贪婪的笑容。{/n}“噢，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，你天真幻想的碎片撕开了你的灵魂。这种感觉是如此甜蜜……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの恐怖の表情に、マラズハイの目は喜びで輝いた。{/n}「そうだな、モン＝ケイよ。お前は自らの種族がいかに弱く、その従者たちもいかにつまらん存在であるかを証明したかったのだろう？エメリナ・リヒテンハルトの名。哀れな獣だ…。新しいご主人様を喜ばせようと躍起になって、お前のすべてを売り渡したあげく…」{n}マラズハイはまるで遠くの音を聞こうとするように首をかしげたあと、肉食獣のような笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「ああ、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス。お前の甘美な幻想の破片が、お前の魂を甘く切り裂いているようだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの恐怖の表情に、マラズハイの目は喜びで輝いた。{/n}「そうだな、モン＝ケイよ。お前は自らの種族がいかに弱く、その従者たちもいかにつまらん存在であるかを証明したかったのだろう？エメリナ・リヒテンハルトの名。哀れな獣だ…。新しいご主人様を喜ばせようと躍起になって、お前のすべてを売り渡したあげく…」{n}マラズハイはまるで遠くの音を聞こうとするように首をかしげたあと、肉食獣のような笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「ああ、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス。お前の甘美な幻想の破片が、お前の魂を甘く切り裂いているようだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Augen blitzen vergnügt auf, als er sieht, wie entsetzt Heinrix schaut.{/n} "Ja, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr wolltet doch den Beweis, wie schwach Eure Art ist und wie unbedeutend Eure Diener sind, oder? Sie heißt Emelina Lichtenhart. Das arme angesengte Biest ... Er mühte sich redlich, wollte seinem neuen Herrn unbedingt gefallen und am Ende hat er Euch alle verkauft..." {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf schief, als ob er einem fernes Geräusch lauschen würde, und grinst dann gefräßig.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. Es wirkt so süß, wie Euch die Scherben Eurer naiven Illusionen die Seele zerschneiden ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Augen blitzen vergnügt auf, als er sieht, wie entsetzt Heinrix schaut.{/n} "Ja, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr wolltet doch den Beweis, wie schwach Eure Art ist und wie unbedeutend Eure Diener sind, oder? Sie heißt Emelina Lichtenhart. Das arme versengte Biest ... Er mühte sich redlich ab, wollte seinem neuen Herrn unbedingt gefallen und am Ende verriet er Euch alle ..." {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf schief, als ob er einem fernes Geräusch lauschen würde, und grinst dann gefräßig.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. Es wirkt so süß, wie Euch die Scherben Eurer naiven Illusionen die Seele zerfressen ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai emiten un destello de placer al ver la cara de espanto de Heinrix.{/n} «Sí, mon-keigh. Querías pruebas de lo débil que es tu especie y de lo insignificantes que son vuestros sirvientes, ¿verdad? Nombró a Emelina Lichtenhart. Pobre bestezuela chamuscada... Se esforzó tanto, estaba tan ansioso por complacer a su nuevo amo que os vendió a todos y cada uno...». {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza, como si intentase oír un sonido en la lejanía, y luego esboza una sonrisa cruel.{/n} «Oh, Heinrix van Calox. Los añicos de tus ingenuas ilusiones desgarran tu alma deliciosamente...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai emiten un destello de placer al ver la cara de espanto de Heinrix.{/n} «Sí, mon-keigh. Querías pruebas de lo débil que es tu especie y de lo insignificantes que son vuestros sirvientes, ¿verdad? Nombró a Emelina Lichtenhart. Pobre criaturilla chamuscada... Se esforzó tanto, estaba tan ansioso por complacer a su nuevo amo que os vendió a todos...». {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza, como si intentase oír un sonido en la lejanía, y luego esboza una sonrisa cruel.{/n} «Oh, Heinrix van Calox. Los añicos de tus ingenuas ilusiones desgarran tu alma deliciosamente...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzündeki dehşet ifadesini görünce Marazhai'ın gözleri zevkle parlıyor.{/n} "Aynen öyle mon-keigh. Türünün ne kadar zayıf olduğunu, hizmetkârlarının ne kadar kıymetsiz olduğunu gösteren bir kanıt isteyen sen değil miydin? Emelina Lichtenhart'ın adı var ya. O zavallı, yanık hayvancağız... Yeni sahibini mutlu etmeyi çok istiyordu, o kadar didindi ki her birinizi teker teker sattı..." {n}Marazhai, uzaklardan gelen bir sesi duymaya çalışıyormuşçasına başını çevirip vahşice sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ah be Heinrix van Calox. Naif kuruntuların parçalanınca ruhun öyle güzel kanıyor ki..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flash with pleasure at the look of horror on Heinrix's face.{/n} "Yes, mon-keigh. You wanted proof of how weak your kind is and how insignificant your servants are, didn't you? The name of Emelina Lichtenhart. The poor singed beast... He tried so hard, he was so eager to please his new master that he sold out every one of you..." {n}Marazhai cocks his head as if straining to hear a distant sound, then grins carnivorously.{/n} "Oh, Heinrix van Calox. The shards of your naive illusions are slicing your soul so sweetly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzündeki dehşet ifadesini görünce Marazhai'ın gözleri zevkle parlıyor.{/n} "Aynen öyle mon-keigh. Türünün ne kadar zayıf olduğunu, hizmetkârlarının ne kadar kıymetsiz olduğunu gösteren bir kanıt isteyen sen değil miydin? Emelina Lichtenhart'ın adı var ya. O zavallı, yanık hayvancağız... Yeni sahibini mutlu etmeyi çok istiyordu, o kadar didindi ki her birinizi teker teker sattı..." {n}Marazhai uzaklardan gelen bir sesi duymaya çalışıyormuşçasına başını çeviriyor, sonra da vahşice sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ah be Heinrix van Calox. Naif kuruntuların parçalanınca ruhun öyle güzel kanıyor ki..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
